biotools.summary: Multiple local alignments of PPI (protein-protein interaction) networks. It is based on the homonymous greedy and stochastic algorithm. It  starts with the identification of sets of similar nodes, called seeds of the alignment and then alignments are then extended in a greedy manner and finally refined.

bioschemas.name: GASOLINE
bioschemas.summary: Multiple local alignments of PPI (protein-protein interaction) networks. It is based on the homonymous greedy and stochastic algorithm. It  starts with the identification of sets of similar nodes, called seeds of the alignment and then alignments are then extended in a greedy manner and finally refined.
